settings.heading: Contact Us
settings.subheading: We'd love to hear from you

settings.question: What are your shipping times?
settings.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days within the continental US. International orders typically arrive within 7-14 business days.

settings.question: Do you offer bulk/wholesale pricing?
settings.answer: Yes! We offer special pricing for gyms, fitness centers, and bulk orders. Please use our contact form or email us directly to discuss your needs.
